Package IMODELS

Interface IViewModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ViewModelMainFrame, ViewModelRegisterFrame, ViewModelShowGrade, ViewModelWelcomFrame
    public interface IViewModel
    this is interface Helps communicate between the models and the views and opposite.

      • addValuesToTableCourses

        void addValuesToTableCourses​(java.lang.String userName,
                             java.lang.String nameCours,
                             java.lang.String year,
                             java.lang.String semster,
                             java.lang.String craditPoint,
                             java.lang.String grade)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException,
                             java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        this method is Add course entries to the name table used to connect
        Parameters:
        userName - user name that is currently logged on
        nameCours - The name of the course that you want to enter the courses table
        year - The year in which the course will take place
        semster - The semester in which the course will take place
        craditPoint - Course Number of Credits
        grade - Final grade of the course
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - The function can throw SQLException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - The function can throw ClassNotFoundException

        Returns:
